column5: If it wasnt for the video and my buddy being there,you guys would of never believed me.  Opening day for lakers finally arrives. Up before 4 am. Ya,couldnt sleep. I have to admit,it feels like we just finished the closer on the ice, and we were back at it again. This time with warmer conditions. No dragging huts,augers and rods behind us.  Greeted with a great sun rise and a nice boat ride out to our grounds.        Knowing this year was going to be a lot different opener then past years due to the late ice out and water temps colder then norm (40 degrees on the surface),the plan was, going to be  slow troll with flutter spoons.  Get the rods loaded and we are trolling for opening day lakers.  We had a few hits and miss,s to start our morning. Bait fish is stupid crazy out there. With the amount of bait we marked,we were thinking why would they hit a shiny hard lure,when they can have some nice soft meat to chow down on.   Then it happened.  Rod goes off . Grab and give a few good hauls to make sure the hook is set. Thats when I say holy crap,it,s a good one. Line is slowly leaving the reel . Yup,this is a good one. With just a steady thumping from depths below,I just play the game and retrieve one turn at a time. Thinking Im making ground,it want to make another dive. Down,down it went again.  After about a 10 minute battle,I start to make ground. Reel, lower the rod,reel, lower the rod and begin to make ground. We can finally see it. Nice fish. I say there,s one following it. Start laughing,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,  I,ll let the vid  tell the rest of the  story. A first for me.     I kept the smaller of the two for a friend, and released the larger one.       Thanks again for a memorable day of fishing buddy.

That is AWESOME!!!  And to think I missed the opener to fix the washing machine..oh well.  There is a good story to my day as well.but I'll start another thread in a bit.  Great day on the water for you both!
Well theres a first for everything lol.Great job guys!
amazing how much bait and fish are swimming around there, glad we drove to that laketrout lake  today

There ya go Bri  You can now boast to being twice the fisherman than anyone else---heck anybody can catch em one at a time  one day....one angler......one hookset.....one limit (2 trout)......priceless  nice fish---BBQ??
Never seen that before.  Wow! Right down on bottom eh.
Greedy bugger eh Terry !

Greedy bugger eh Terry !  Making up for those that I didnt get during the ice season,   Rob Im going to drift two hooks sunday. One with a roe bag,the other with a pinkie worm.   Not for me Terrance.  Im not a laker eating guy. My friends,that cant get out for them though,like them.   Didnt see you out there Dave    Will,it would of still been there when you got home.
Will,it would of still been there when you got home.  True enough Brian but the parts place would have been closed.
I wouldn't eat those Simcoe pigs either, but they sure look fun to catch.

nice ! had that with a pair of bass once on a single jerk bait, but that is pretty cool.  I had a similar experience with the bait fish this morning - found one cloud over 20 foot tall and filled the split screen on my elite 5. But nothing around. Hopefully tomorrow will be more productive.
I've lost count of how many times that's happened to me on Lake O, but it's cool every time it happens.
Thats cool.
That's crazy B!  Never seen that before.  Way to go guys.  Was a beauty day to be out there that's for sure.
Shakers out in Lake O like to do this as well... One on the cheater, one on the main spoon.
Good job man that's really awesome!!
Awesome guys! Now Brian, you had your sign, right?
Thats awesome Bâ€¦.makes my day!
Awesome guys! Now Brian, you had your sign, right?   Plenty of time still.
great report, you guys are hilarious, I like the dialogue during that video, Hahaha
Nice job! We managed a few whities and 2 lakers jigging near BBP on saturday, pretty slow though and nothing huge, hopefully it picks up soon.
Very nice Brian. Cheers !
That pretty cool boys... but the real question of course is, what broke out there! LOL HH
LOL, Had that happen a few times.. You think you caught the big one then you find out it's just a tag team working against you.
HAve had duble walleye fishing erie, alsohad a steely/walleye and the walleye was on the slider!
